entry.title: Libre/Open blockchain / cryptographic ASICs
entry.summary: Luke Kenneth Casson Leighton wrote an email asking ZmnSCPxj to send moderated (off-topic) messages to libre-soc-dev at lists.libre-soc.org instead of bitcoin-dev-moderation. However, Bryan replied that he could not see any of Luke Kenneth Casson Leighton's February emails in ozlabs archives for the bitcoin-dev mailing list. Bryan also shared his Twitter profile link. The thread for the bitcoin-dev mailing list can be found on https://lists.linuxfoundation.org/pipermail/bitcoin-dev/2021-February/thread.html.
